title: Expect Tariff Ruling To Say Not Permitted: Hillman
description: As markets wait on the Supreme Court’s next opinion day on Wednesday, Jennifer Hillman, Former Vice Chair of the US Internal Trade Commission and a former Member of the World Trade Organization Appellate Body, tells Bloomberg that she expects the justices will ultimately find the tariffs not permitted under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act. She discusses more on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
